interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: DAGEDA Lip Balm,6Boxs Colorful Fruity Moisturizing Jelly Lip Lotion Set,Travel Size Hydrating Nourishing Repair Lip Balms For Cracked Dry Lips&Plumper Soften Lips Mask Skin Care Gift Kit For Kid Women
Review Date: 2021/03/05
Store: DAGEDA
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAGEDA', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 4.65 x 1.06 inches; 4.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '767065401431'}
Review Text: I'll be honest, I mainly bought these because of how adorable these are. I love macarons & these look just like them. The containers are secure & feel sturdy, but are also lightweight. The lip balms are really nice & have a jelly like texture. They aren't as moisturizing are Laneige or Vaseline lip balms, but I like that they aren't super thick because they work well under lipstick without messing it up like other lip balms do sometimes. They all smell amazing. The pink one (strawberry I think) is definitely my favorite. Once I'm done with the lip balms I'm definitely keeping the containers to use for other things.
Review Title: So cute 😍
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Advanced vitamin C serum with natural Antioxidant for fine lines and wrinkles Firm and Youthful formula by Essy Essy ['Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum is the natural way to obtain younger looking skin without any harsh chemicals.', "Vitamin C is known for its anti-oxidant properties that are powerful and effective in repairing and protecting skin from UV damage and pollutants. It's an industry recognized ingredient that diminishes years of wrinkles and fine lines for a smoother and more beautiful complexion.", 'Benefits:', '-Reverse UV damage -Lighten dark spots and acne scars -Repair skin -Reduce wrinkles and fine lines -Prevent further hyper pigmentation -Increase collagen production -Even out skin tone -Prevent acne breakouts -Gentle enough for sensitive skin', 'Directions:', 'Cleanse and dry your face and neck. After toner, massage a small amount of Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum to your face, neck and décolleté until fully absorbed. Follow with your regular moisturizer. For best results, we recommend using this serum every night before bedtime.', 'Caution:', 'For external use only. Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Patch test on skin before first use. If skin irritation occurs, stop use. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Please store in a cool place.'] {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Essy', 'Unit Count': '1.02 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3.1 x 1.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '736631212993'} I've been using this serum twice a week for the last 3 weeks and my skin feels great.
Almost immediately after putting it on my pores become visibly smaller. The discoloration and redness on my cheeks and forehead are much less visible in the morning if I use it at night.
This serum works just as well as the high-end ones and is at a much more reasonable price.
I'm definitely recommending this brand to all my friends. Great Inexpensive Serum Beauty Glazed Gorgeous Me Eyeshadow Palette Matte Professional 63 Colors Eyeshadow Cosmetic Matte Eyeshadow Cream +Makeup Brushes Set and Powder Blender Sponge Beauty Glazed {'Color': 'B37-63 Shades', 'Brand': 'Beauty Glazed', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.79 x 3.9 x 0.59 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796032686', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Glazed'} This palette doesn't have all the qualities of a high end eyeshadow palette, but it is one of the best low cost palettes I've gotten before.
I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. The more vibrant shimmers do have a lot of fallout so I'd suggest using a shadow shield or doing your foundation and concealer after so you can cover it up. Also I would highly recommend using your finger or a sponge tip brush to apply the shimmers and pack on the color. Great Budget Friendly Palette Azure OLD PEEL OFF COLLECTION (Fantasy Collection) Azure Cosmetics {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.7 Ounce', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.5 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07JFDJTGC_US', 'UPC': '689513274407'} These masks are really cute and glittery. They're perfect for a fun girl's night and really pull everything out of your pores, but I'm not the biggest fan of the scents. The strawberry cupcake one is okay, but the other two smell like child's medicine. It doesn't linger once the mask is applied and starts drying so it doesn't bother me too much. Just keep it in mind if you're very sensitive to smells. Cute and Glittery Double Color Lipstick Waterproof Long-Lasting Lip Gloss Moisturzing Nourishing Lipsticks Balm Lip Cosmetics By Shouhengda (4 Colors Set（5678） Shouhengda {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 6.3 x 2.91 inches; 4.62 Ounces'} I wouldn't call these tints since they aren't the most long lasting, but they are still pretty nevertheless. I would recommend applying a lip balm before applying the ombre tint because it'll make it so much easier. All of the colors are very pretty & unique from one another. I didn't get any repeats. Easy ombre lip Magic Your Life Lip Gloss Smooth Tint 6 Sets Ocean Blue Co {'Brand': 'Ocean Blue Co', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'UPC': '738685260548'} I love collecting lip products in adorable packaging & I also love lip tints so these cute little cones are a match made in heaven for me. The packaging feels sturdy & secure so I'm pretty sure these won't leak in my purse. The tints themselves are long lasting & very pigmented. I still have some stains from where I swatched them 😅 They were all packed in a small bubble mailer with super pretty gold confetti which was a nice touch. They also included two stickers (a starfish & a sea turtle) which is super nice of them. If I see anything else from this seller that I like then I'll definitely buy it. Super cute & pigmented tints DAGEDA Color Changing Liquid Lipstick Set, 3Pcs Aloe Vera Color-Change Moisturizing Lip Oil, Temperature Color Changing Hydrated Travel Size Lip Gloss&Long Lasting Plumper Repair Lips Skin Care Kit DAGEDA {'Brand': 'DAGEDA', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 3.66 x 1.18 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '767065401561'} I love the bright bubble gum pink that most color changing lip products turn in to & I love cute makeup packaging so I knew I love these. One of them did leak a bit in transit, but luckily nothing else I bought was stained. All 3 are the same shade of pink so don't get these expecting 3 different colors. They are very moisturizing & the color is long lasting. They have a light floral scent, but it isn't noticeable once you put it on. I don't mind fragrances in lip products so it doesn't bother me. Super cute & pigmented DAGEDA Lip Balm,6Boxs Colorful Fruity Moisturizing Jelly Lip Lotion Set,Travel Size Hydrating Nourishing Repair Lip Balms For Cracked Dry Lips&Plumper Soften Lips Mask Skin Care Gift Kit For Kid Women DAGEDA {'Brand': 'DAGEDA', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 4.65 x 1.06 inches; 4.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '767065401431'} I'll be honest, I mainly bought these because of how adorable these are. I love macarons & these look just like them. The containers are secure & feel sturdy, but are also lightweight. The lip balms are really nice & have a jelly like texture. They aren't as moisturizing are Laneige or Vaseline lip balms, but I like that they aren't super thick because they work well under lipstick without messing it up like other lip balms do sometimes. They all smell amazing. The pink one (strawberry I think) is definitely my favorite. Once I'm done with the lip balms I'm definitely keeping the containers to use for other things. So cute 😍
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Focus:** The user prioritizes effective skincare products targeting signs of aging, while also enjoying vibrant cosmetics that enhance beauty. Recently, there’s a noticeable enthusiasm for fun and pigmented lip products that provide moisturizing benefits and come in cute, appealing packaging. 

- **Ingredient Preference:** Favors natural, chemical-free formulations, with a particular interest in Vitamin C for its antioxidant properties. Enjoys lip products that feature nourishing qualities and contribute to skin health.

- **Product Performance:** Values skincare that visibly improves texture and tone, addressing redness and discoloration. Prefers makeup that is long-lasting, easy to apply, and integrates well into layering techniques for the best results.

- **Application Habits:** Engages in structured skincare routines, applying makeup with attention to detail, especially when preparing lips for color.

- **Value-Based Purchasing:** Seeks quality products at reasonable prices, often comparing them to higher-end alternatives while appreciating budget-friendly cosmetics that maintain effectiveness and uniqueness.

- **Recommendation Tendencies:** Actively recommends effective beauty products to friends, reflecting a social aspect of their shopping habits.

- **Skin Type:** Prefers formulations suited for dry, sensitive skin, valuing gentle ingredients. Enjoys versatile products that enhance skincare and makeup routines and is mindful of pleasant scents. 

This update reflects a continued commitment to skincare efficacy and a growing fascination with charming and functional lip products.
